set(INC
	.
)

set(INC_SYS

)

set(SRC
	Alloc.c
	LzFind.c
	LzmaDec.c
	LzmaEnc.c
	LzmaLib.c

	Alloc.h
	LzFind.h
	LzHash.h
	LzmaDec.h
	LzmaEnc.h
	LzmaLib.h
	Types.h
)

blender_add_lib(extern_lzma "${SRC}" "${INC}" "${INC_SYS}")
